title: Riot plz answer this
body: When i can change my region from na to eune ?? I cant charge rp to my na account .. i live in greece and now we have capital control .. riot plz fix this i cant play now on my acc and i must change my region to eune

replies.body: We'd like to help out with your specific issue individually, but can't here on the boards.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look!  We'll reply as soon as we can!
